com.eemi.ext4j.client.events

Class HandlerRegistration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.events.HandlerRegistration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.web.bindery.event.shared.HandlerRegistration

    public class HandlerRegistration
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gwt.event.shared.HandlerRegistration
    Registration class for event handlers. This class is returned when adding an event handler to a component.
